menu.title: Menu "Fitness"
menu.descr: Menu "Fitness" is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people who are interested in sports; active and healthy. This is a completely new product with an optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: Menu "Premium"
menu.descr: Menu "Premium" - we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to the restaurant!

menu.title: Menu "Lenten"
menu.descr: Menu  "Lenten" is a careful selection of ingredients: complete absence of animal products, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein from tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.
